perfil.descripcion: I turn time into knowledge, knowledge into solutions, and solutions into opportunities that drive my personal and professional growth.

sobremi.Parrafo1: I am passionate about technology and web development, with a solid background as an IT Technician and practical experience creating websites. I am always looking to learn new technologies to improve my skills.
sobremi.Parrafo2: My goal is to contribute to the success of innovative web projects by providing creative and efficient solutions. I am committed to continuous learning and constant improvement, seeking opportunities to grow professionally in the field of web development.

experiencia.title: Documentation Analyst
experiencia.description: Responsible for developing an application to manage processes related to a bidding process, using Microsoft 365 technological tools. Also collaborated in the development of a business quotation web system, implemented with Angular CLI, MySQL, and JavaScript.

tecnologias.parrafo: This section gathers the languages and technologies I use and have applied in the field of web development, dynamic interfaces, scalable applications, and robust solutions.

item1.title: Web System for Statistical Analysis
item1.subtitle: High School Project
item1.description: Together with a team of three people, a web system was designed and developed focused on analyzing prices and demand in a supermarket chain, using statistical tools to facilitate business decision-making

footer.texto: Built by {{name}} {{year}}  Turning ideas into code.
